p: However, it is well known that several chemotypes of Thymus serpyllum have been described until now [ 26, 27, 28]; as differences in chemical composition have a notable influence on investigated biological activities, new data are of great importance. Besides, it is well known that EOsâ€™ chemical composition, contributing to their medicinal value and being responsible for the biological properties, highly depends on many factors such as geographical and climatic conditions, harvesting, isolation techniques, as well as storage [ 29, 30].
